Joel Osteen: s appearance on the Kilmeade And Friends radio show where he expressed his understanding of Trump's message to "make our country great again" and referred to Trump as an incredible communicator and friend of his ministry.
The recirculation of Osteen: s comments with misleading headlines suggesting that he had officially endorsed Trump for president.
Osteen: s clarification of his political position through a statement released by his church, stating that he had not endorsed any candidate for President of the United States.
Background information about Joel Osteen: being the pastor at Houston-based Lakewood Church, one of the largest in the United States.
